rows.label: qst101101_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm very busy with a large furniture
order from a Superbian official.

rows.label: qst101101_msg0002
rows.name:
All the furniture I
make is custom-made...

rows.label: qst101101_msg0003
rows.name:
I pride myself on using high-quality
Gulan wood to create pieces that
meet the client's wishes.

rows.label: qst101101_msg0004
rows.name:
...Come to think of it, you're a
new face. Are you a traveler?

rows.label: qst101101_msg0005
rows.name:
Have you seen my son...
Hol, on your way?

rows.label: qst101101_msg0006
rows.name:
I see... He should have
been back by now...

rows.label: qst101101_msg0007
rows.name:
I asked my son, Hol, to run an
errand, but he hasn't returned.

rows.label: qst101101_msg0008
rows.name:
He's at that age, so I can
overlook a little dallying,
but I can't help but worry...

rows.label: qst101101_msg0009
rows.name:
I spoke with the Superbian official
who ordered the furniture,

rows.label: qst101101_msg0010
rows.name:
but not only would he not extend the deadline,
he said he'd shut down my shop if I was
late... I can't even go look for him.

rows.label: qst101101_msg0011
rows.name:
They talk about maintaining public
order, but there are more than
a few who act like rulers.

rows.label: qst101101_msg0012
rows.name:
I'm sorry to trouble a traveler with
such matters... It's our problem.
Please forget I said anything.

rows.label: qst101101_msg0013
rows.name:
What? No, I couldn't
possibly trouble you.

rows.label: qst101101_msg0015
rows.name:
My son, Hol, should have
headed for Zain's Waytree.

rows.label: qst101102_msg0102
rows.name:
He should have headed for Zain's
Waytree near Torigo... Please,
I'm counting on you for Hol.
